Class JobSystemCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • coordinators.JobSystemCoordinator

  • public class JobSystemCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the coordinator handling all interactions with the client.
    Author:
    Mathias Wiesbauer

    • Method Detail

      • callInstruction

        public static java.lang.String callInstruction(int instructionID,
                                               java.lang.String[] inst)
        Calls the correct methods based on the instruction ID. Also passes the parameters to the method.
        Parameters:
        instructionID - the ID of the instruction to be called
        inst - the array of parameters passed
        Returns:
        a String will be returned indicating the instructions success or failure

      • signUp

        public static java.lang.String signUp(java.lang.String[] inst)
        Coordinates the signup process in the system.
        Parameters:
        inst - The string array containing the 6 elements required for signup.
        Returns:
        success or failure message to be printed.
